game.title: Bounty Hunter's Calling
game.objective: Defeat the notorious rogue, Kargath Bladefist
game.description: A rogue orc named Kargath Bladefist has been terrorizing the lands. Take on the challenge, prove your worth and defeat him

tasks.description: Explore the Whispering Woods and find the entrance to Kargath's hideout.
Engage in a battle with Kargath and defeat him.
